abilities.name: Conductivity
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card to a Pokémon from his or her hand, this Power does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance) This power stops working if you have more than 1 Dark Ampharos in play or while Dark Ampharos is Asleep, Confused or Paralysed.

attacks.name: Shock Bolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to this Pokémon in order to use this attack.
